settings.custom_liquid:
Clinically proven Acne & Rosacea Treatment

Recovery & Repair Gel



$55.00

Clinically proven results. 100% natural ingredients.
Innovative red algae gel suitable for the face and body

A lightweight, nourishing, natural gel that alters the way your skin behaves. Everyone deserves to love their skin. Prescription medications target one problem, while creating another. We target your skin problems, without creating more. Welcome to the world of effective skincare with no side-effects. Clinically-proven to target acne and rosacea all while working as a super-hydrator to give you a five-star glow. We use an innovative cold-pressing technique to extract the bio-active compound in red-algae which is the superfood for your skin. The active compound in red-algae boasts an internal healing process, encouraging your cell to produce healthy cells and healthy skin all by itself.

Sound too good to be true? Read on.

Size

Our refills can only be used with the original Seacra bottle. Simply unscrew the lid, remove the empty cartridge. Recycle. Insert the new refill. Healthy Skin is yours.

settings.custom_liquid:
Skin Microbiome


An imbalance in the skin's microbiome will lead to upsetting issues like acne, rosacea, dryness, eczema, and more.


Think about that perfectly soft, smooth skin you see on babies – their microbiome has not been altered by the environment, hormones, or chemicals.


So, when people talk and search for glowing, smooth skin… what they are really searching for is healthy skin.


Skin that has the ideal microbiome balance.
How you change the way your skin behaves?

Damaged Skin Microbiome
Heathy Skin Microbiome
Find out why 97% of women love our Recovery & Repair Gel here

Fragrance Free

All our products are Fragrance free, making them suitable for all skin types.

Vegan

All our products are suitable for vegans.

Suitable for all skin types

Our products are suitable for all skin types from sensitive to oily skin.

Natural Ingredients

We use high-quality, natural ingredients in all our products. No compromises

Cruelty Free

We’ve never tested an animals and never will.

<span style="font-size: 34px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; color: #cc4e61"> It’s as simple as it’s natural</span
><div>

<span style="font-size: 34px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">
  And it works. </span
>

No more bad skin days. Ever.

Why suffer side-effects when you don’t have to?

settings.heading: 28 Days
settings.description:
Your skin will retain moisture & increase hydration by an average of 17%-resulting in a shinier, smoother and even skin tone.

Redness and inflammation will have decreased by an average of 20%.

Bumps, blemishes and acne will have diminished in size.

Astaxanthin, the bioactive compound in red algae is a strong antioxidant, this in combination with your SPF will protect your skin from premature ageing and the onset of fine lines and wrinkles.

settings.heading: 56 Days
settings.description:
Your skin will be less prone to breakouts because of the powerful Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae, which can limit external stressorssuch as reactive oxidative species, the skin’s reaction to temperature, pollution and humidity.

By now, you will see a significant reduction in redness & inflammation.

Previous bumps, blemishes and acne will be less visible, you will have less new breakouts and previous scarring will become less visible.

The skin regained its healthy colorand will feel soft, supple and smooth.

settings.heading: 84 Days
settings.description:
Acne, blemishes & bumps will disappear.

The skin is plump, glowing & smooth.

The skin is clear and congestion free.

The skin's barrier is strong and resilient.

Dark spots & hyperpigmentation will begin to fade.

Wrinkles and fine lines will be reduced.
